text: Soni yaili kumawunde ni yaili petaka nsyene jwakwe Allah, soni chisimu chene pamasile pa twaachisyisye awala wana kupedwaga chitabu paujo penu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) ni jenumanja wakwe yanti mun'jogopani Allah, nambo naga nkufulu, basi (ni yenu), chisimu Allah iwele Yakwe yaili kumawunde ni yaili petaka, ni awele Allah Jwakupata kwejinji Jwakulapilidwa kusyesyene
